## Summary

- What changed and why?

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Docs only
- [ ] Refactor / chore

## Validation

- [ ] `mvn -q test`
- [ ] Relevant smoke scripts
- [ ] Manual checks (if needed)

## Checklist

- [ ] I updated docs (`README.md` / `docs/`) if behavior changed.
- [ ] I added or updated tests/scripts for new behavior.
- [ ] I considered compatibility and rollback impact.
